examples: Where did you buy that dress?
She had no money to buy a ticket.
No tenía dinero para comprar un boleto.
They can't afford to buy school books.
No pueden permitirse comprar libros escolares.
If you're thinking of getting a new car, now is a good time to buy.
Si está pensando en adquirir un automóvil nuevo, ahora es un buen momento para comprarlo.
